title: Daddy’s Home 2 Review - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 11.28.18
description:
Get 15% off your first pair of MeUndies plus free shipping at http://meundies.com/morning
Get your first refill pack free at http://getquip.com/KFMS.
Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock to build your portfolio at http://morningshow.robinhood.com.

Finally, Nick reviews Daddy’s Home 2.

-Black Panther scribe Joe Robert Cole to write call of duty movie sequel (23:00 mins)
-Nicks Daddys Home 2 review (26:50 mins)
-Exclusive: Kingsman prequel is a period drama; Kingsman 3 also filming last year (34:20 mins)
-Netflix is making a live-action version of classic anime Cowboy Bebop (39:50 mins)

Thanks to https://twitter.com/Kumailh for the timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
